passive_1: Dealing ability damage to a champion at 600 units away or greater from the cast position reveals them for 6 seconds.
passive_2: Upon triggering Hypershot, grant sight of the area 1400 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply Hypershot's effects to enemy champions within for 3 seconds (30 second cooldown).

passive_1: Dealing ability damage to a champion at 600 units away or greater from the cast position reveals them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.
passive_2: Upon triggering Hypershot, grant sight of the area 1400 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply Hypershot's effects to enemy champions within for 3 seconds (30 second cooldown).

passive_1: Dealing ability damage to a champion at 700 units away or greater from the cast position reveals them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.
passive_2: Upon triggering Hypershot, grant sight of the area 1200 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply Hypershot's effects to enemy champions within for 3 seconds (30 second cooldown).

passive_1: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted ability at more than 700 units away or slowing, immobilizing or polymorphing one reveals them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: No longer applies Focus Fire to allies knocked back by Blast Cones
